title: Max Notify

send_message.name: Send message
send_message.description: Send a text message to Max chat(s). Use entity_id and/or config_entry_id with chat_id or user_id.

send_photo.name: Send photo
send_photo.description: Send a photo to Max chat(s). File: local path or image URL. Use entity_id and/or config_entry_id with chat_id or user_id.

send_document.name: Send document
send_document.description: Send a file as document to Max chat(s). File: local path or URL. May preserve quality vs. send_photo.

send_video.name: Send video
send_video.description: Send a video to Max chat(s). File: local path or URL (mp4, mov, webm, mkv). Use entity_id and/or config_entry_id with chat_id or user_id.
